name: Fruit Garden Mania: Match-3 Puzzle Game
name_original: Fruit Garden Mania: Match-3 Puzzle Game
description:
Fruit Garden Mania is a very addictive Match 3 gameplay.
Features:
- 100+ well designed levels
- Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups
- Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
- Easy to play, challenging to master
- Free to play
